definitions.definition: The act of dichotomizing or the thing dichotomized ; classification into 2 subsets (that is, a dichotomy ); the special case of discretization in which n = 2.

main_definition: The act of dichotomizing or the thing dichotomized ; classification into 2 subsets (that is, a dichotomy ); the special case of discretization in which n = 2.
